item.description:
Hi Folks,

Coffee Talk Meetup will take place at Cheshire Coffee in the lovely town of Cheshire,

CT at 4 pm.

Cheshire, CT was incorporated in 1780.

It has remained one of New England's lovely small towns in the United States.

Exuding New England charm, this lovely town is known for one of the oldest school's

in the country founded in 1794 (Cheshire Academy),

it's lovely village (Cheshire Village), the Farmington Canal,

a beautiful walking and hiking trail that runs through the town

and also some interesting restaurants, cafes and

also one of my personal favorite coffee shops.

This lovely coffee establishment has delicious coffee

(various brewed coffees of the day, their delicious latte's -

Autumn Harvest Latte) and various anytime sweet treats

(Chocolate Croissants, Pumpkin Cheesecake, etc.), small sandwich menu

and also a very warm inviting fireplace, beautiful photography,

and friendly Batista that know their coffee drinks and pairings really well.

Cheshire Coffee boasts all things charming about small sophisticated

New England towns in CT.

http://cheshirecoffee.com/catalog/about_us.php

cheshirecoffee.com/catalog/about_us.php

We looking forward to see you there for the month of March.

Cheers,

Swadhi

Your Event Host

and Assistant Organizer
item.how_to_find_us: We will be in the back by the leather couches & their lovely fireplace.
item.name: Coffee Talk - Coffee in this lovely, quaint New England town of Cheshire
